   20: -module(bs_match_misc_no_opt_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   23: 	 bound_var/1,bound_tail/1,t_float/1,little_float/1,sean/1,
   24: 	 kenneth/1,encode_binary/1,native/1,happi/1,
   25: 	 size_var/1,wiger/1,x0_context/1,huge_float_field/1,
   26: 	 writable_binary_matched/1,otp_7198/1,unordered_bindings/1,
   27: 	 float_middle_endian/1,unsafe_get_binary_reuse/1, fp16/1,
   28:          bad_bs_match/1]).
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: 
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   34:      {timetrap, {seconds, 10}}].
   35: 
   36: all() -> 
   37:     [bound_var, bound_tail, t_float, little_float, sean,
   38:      kenneth, encode_binary, native, happi, size_var, wiger,
   39:      x0_context, huge_float_field, writable_binary_matched,
   40:      otp_7198, unordered_bindings, float_middle_endian,
   41:      unsafe_get_binary_reuse, fp16,
   42:      bad_bs_match].
   43: 
   44: 
   45: %% Test matching of bound variables.
   46: bound_var(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   47:     ok = bound_var(42, 13, <<42,13>>),
   48:     nope = bound_var(42, 13, <<42,255>>),
   49:     nope = bound_var(42, 13, <<154,255>>),
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: bound_var(A, B, <<A:8,B:8>>) -> ok;
   53: bound_var(_, _, _) -> nope.
   54: 
   55: %% Test matching of a bound tail.
   56: bound_tail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   57:     ok = bound_tail(<<>>, <<13,14>>),
   58:     ok = bound_tail(<<2,3>>, <<1,1,2,3>>),
   59:     nope = bound_tail(<<2,3>>, <<1,1,2,7>>),
   60:     nope = bound_tail(<<2,3>>, <<1,1,2,3,4>>),
   61:     nope = bound_tail(<<2,3>>, <<>>),
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: bound_tail(T, <<_:16,T/binary>>) -> ok;
   65: bound_tail(_, _) -> nope.
   66: 
   67: t_float(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   68:     F = f1(),
   69:     G = f_one(),
   70: 
   71:     G = match_float(<<63,128,0,0>>, 32, 0),
   72:     G = match_float(<<63,240,0,0,0,0,0,0>>, 64, 0),
   73: 
   74:     fcmp(F, match_float(<<F:32/float>>, 32, 0)),
   75:     fcmp(F, match_float(<<F:64/float>>, 64, 0)),
   76:     fcmp(F, match_float(<<1:1,F:32/float,127:7>>, 32, 1)),
   77:     fcmp(F, match_float(<<1:1,F:64/float,127:7>>, 64, 1)),
   78:     fcmp(F, match_float(<<1:13,F:32/float,127:3>>, 32, 13)),
   79:     fcmp(F, match_float(<<1:13,F:64/float,127:3>>, 64, 13)),
   80: 
   81:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch match_float(<<0,0>>, 8, 0)),
   82:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch match_float(<<0,0>>, 16#7fffffff, 0)),
   83: 
   84:     ok.
   85: 
   86: float_middle_endian(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   87:     F = 9007199254740990.0, % turns to -NaN when word-swapped
   88:     fcmp(F, match_float(<<F:64/float>>, 64, 0)),
   89:     fcmp(F, match_float(<<1:1,F:64/float,127:7>>, 64, 1)),
   90:     fcmp(F, match_float(<<1:13,F:64/float,127:3>>, 64, 13)),
   91:     ok.
   92: 
   93: 
   94: fcmp(0.0, 0.0) -> ok;
   95: fcmp(F1, F2) when (F1 - F2) / F2 < 0.0000001 -> ok.
   96:     
   97: match_float(Bin0, Fsz, I) ->
   98:     Bin = make_sub_bin(Bin0),
   99:     Bsz = size(Bin) * 8,
  100:     Tsz = Bsz - Fsz - I,
  101:     <<_:I,F:Fsz/float,_:Tsz>> = Bin,
  102:     F.
  103: 
  104: little_float(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  105:     F = f2(),
  106:     G = f_one(),
  107: 
  108:     G = match_float_little(<<0,0,0,0,0,0,240,63>>, 64, 0),
  109:     G = match_float_little(<<0,0,128,63>>, 32, 0),
  110: 
  111:     fcmp(F, match_float_little(<<F:32/float-little>>, 32, 0)),
  112:     fcmp(F, match_float_little(<<F:64/float-little>>, 64, 0)),
  113:     fcmp(F, match_float_little(<<1:1,F:32/float-little,127:7>>, 32, 1)),
  114:     fcmp(F, match_float_little(<<1:1,F:64/float-little,127:7>>, 64, 1)),
  115:     fcmp(F, match_float_little(<<1:13,F:32/float-little,127:3>>, 32, 13)),
  116:     fcmp(F, match_float_little(<<1:13,F:64/float-little,127:3>>, 64, 13)),
  117: 
  118:     ok.
  119: 
  120: match_float_little(Bin0, Fsz, I) ->
  121:     Bin = make_sub_bin(Bin0),
  122:     Bsz = size(Bin) * 8,
  123:     Tsz = Bsz - Fsz - I,
  124:     <<_:I,F:Fsz/float-little,_:Tsz>> = Bin,
  125:     F.
  126: 
  127: 
  128: make_sub_bin(Bin0) ->
  129:     Sz = size(Bin0),
  130:     Bin1 = <<37,Bin0/binary,38,39>>,
  131:     <<_:8,Bin:Sz/binary,_:8,_:8>> = Bin1,
  132:     Bin.
  133: 
  134: f1() ->
  135:     3.1415.
  136: 
  137: f2() ->
  138:     2.7133.
  139: 
  140: f_one() ->
  141:     1.0.
  142: 
  143: sean(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  144:     small = sean1(<<>>),
  145:     small = sean1(<<1>>),
  146:     small = sean1(<<1,2>>),
  147:     small = sean1(<<1,2,3>>),
  148:     large = sean1(<<1,2,3,4>>),
  149: 
  150:     small = sean1(<<4>>),
  151:     small = sean1(<<4,5>>),
  152:     small = sean1(<<4,5,6>>),
  153:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch sean1(<<4,5,6,7>>)),
  154:     ok.
  155: 
  156: sean1(<<B/binary>>) when byte_size(B) < 4 -> small;
  157: sean1(<<1, _B/binary>>) -> large.
  158: 
  159: kenneth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  160:     {ok,[145,148,113,129,0,0,0,0]} = 
  161: 	msisdn_internal_storage(<<145,148,113,129,0,0,0,0>>, []).
  162: 
  163: msisdn_internal_storage(<<>>,MSISDN) ->
  164:     {ok,lists:reverse(MSISDN)};
  165: msisdn_internal_storage(<<2#11111111:8,_Rest/binary>>,MSISDN) ->
  166:     {ok,lists:reverse(MSISDN)};
  167: msisdn_internal_storage(<<2#1111:4,DigitN:4,_Rest/binary>>,MSISDN) when
  168:     DigitN < 10 ->
  169:     {ok,lists:reverse([(DigitN bor 2#11110000)|MSISDN])};
  170: msisdn_internal_storage(<<DigitNplus1:4,DigitN:4,Rest/binary>>,MSISDN) when
  171:     DigitNplus1 < 10,
  172:     DigitN < 10 ->
  173:     NewMSISDN=[((DigitNplus1 bsl 4) bor DigitN)|MSISDN],
  174:     msisdn_internal_storage(Rest,NewMSISDN);
  175: msisdn_internal_storage(_Rest,_MSISDN) ->
  176:     {fault}. %% Mandatory IE incorrect
  177: 
  178: encode_binary(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  179:     "C2J2QiSc" = encodeBinary(<<11,98,118,66,36,156>>, []),
  180:     ok.
  181: 
  182: encodeBinary(<<>>, Output) ->
  183:     lists:reverse(Output);
  184: encodeBinary(<<Data:1/binary>>, Output) ->
  185:     <<DChar1:6, DChar2:2>> = Data,
  186:     Char1 = getBase64Char(DChar1),
  187:     Char2 = getBase64Char(DChar2),
  188:     Char3 = "=",
  189:     Char4 = "=",
  190:     NewOutput = Char4 ++ Char3 ++ Char2 ++ Char1 ++ Output,
  191:     encodeBinary(<<>>, NewOutput);
  192: encodeBinary(<<Data:2/binary>>, Output) ->
  193:     <<DChar1:6, DChar2:6, DChar3:4>> = Data,
  194:     Char1 = getBase64Char(DChar1),
  195:     Char2 = getBase64Char(DChar2),
  196:     Char3 = getBase64Char(DChar3),
  197:     Char4 = "=",
  198:     NewOutput = Char4 ++ Char3 ++ Char2 ++ Char1 ++ Output,
  199:     encodeBinary(<<>>, NewOutput);
  200: encodeBinary(<<Data:3/binary, Rest/binary>>, Output) ->
  201:     <<DChar1:6, DChar2:6, DChar3:6, DChar4:6>> = Data,
  202:     Char1 = getBase64Char(DChar1),
  203:     Char2 = getBase64Char(DChar2),
  204:     Char3 = getBase64Char(DChar3),
  205:     Char4 = getBase64Char(DChar4),
  206:     NewOutput = Char4 ++ Char3 ++ Char2 ++ Char1 ++ Output,
  207:     encodeBinary(Rest, NewOutput);
  208: encodeBinary(_Data, _) ->
  209:     error.
  210: 
  211: getBase64Char(0)  -> "A";
  212: getBase64Char(1)  -> "B";
  213: getBase64Char(2)  -> "C";
  214: getBase64Char(3)  -> "D";
  215: getBase64Char(4)  -> "E";
  216: getBase64Char(5)  -> "F";
  217: getBase64Char(6)  -> "G";
  218: getBase64Char(7)  -> "H";
  219: getBase64Char(8)  -> "I";
  220: getBase64Char(9)  -> "J";
  221: getBase64Char(10) -> "K";
  222: getBase64Char(11) -> "L";
  223: getBase64Char(12) -> "M";
  224: getBase64Char(13) -> "N";
  225: getBase64Char(14) -> "O";
  226: getBase64Char(15) -> "P";
  227: getBase64Char(16) -> "Q";
  228: getBase64Char(17) -> "R";
  229: getBase64Char(18) -> "S";
  230: getBase64Char(19) -> "T";
  231: getBase64Char(20) -> "U";
  232: getBase64Char(21) -> "V";
  233: getBase64Char(22) -> "W";
  234: getBase64Char(23) -> "X";
  235: getBase64Char(24) -> "Y";
  236: getBase64Char(25) -> "Z";
  237: getBase64Char(26) -> "a";
  238: getBase64Char(27) -> "b";
  239: getBase64Char(28) -> "c";
  240: getBase64Char(29) -> "d";
  241: getBase64Char(30) -> "e";
  242: getBase64Char(31) -> "f";
  243: getBase64Char(32) -> "g";
  244: getBase64Char(33) -> "h";
  245: getBase64Char(34) -> "i";
  246: getBase64Char(35) -> "j";
  247: getBase64Char(36) -> "k";
  248: getBase64Char(37) -> "l";
  249: getBase64Char(38) -> "m";
  250: getBase64Char(39) -> "n";
  251: getBase64Char(40) -> "o";
  252: getBase64Char(41) -> "p";
  253: getBase64Char(42) -> "q";
  254: getBase64Char(43) -> "r";
  255: getBase64Char(44) -> "s";
  256: getBase64Char(45) -> "t";
  257: getBase64Char(46) -> "u";
  258: getBase64Char(47) -> "v";
  259: getBase64Char(48) -> "w";
  260: getBase64Char(49) -> "x";
  261: getBase64Char(50) -> "y";
  262: getBase64Char(51) -> "z";
  263: getBase64Char(52) -> "0";
  264: getBase64Char(53) -> "1";
  265: getBase64Char(54) -> "2";
  266: getBase64Char(55) -> "3";
  267: getBase64Char(56) -> "4";
  268: getBase64Char(57) -> "5";
  269: getBase64Char(58) -> "6";
  270: getBase64Char(59) -> "7";
  271: getBase64Char(60) -> "8";
  272: getBase64Char(61) -> "9";
  273: getBase64Char(62) -> "+";
  274: getBase64Char(63) -> "/";
  275: getBase64Char(_Else) ->
  276:     %% This is an illegal input.
  277: %    cgLogEM:log(error, ?MODULE, getBase64Char, [Else],
  278: %		"illegal input",
  279: %		?LINE, version()),
  280:     "**".
  281: 
  282: -define(M(F), <<F>> = <<F>>).
  283: 
  284: native(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  285:     ?M(3.14:64/native-float), 
  286:     ?M(333:16/native),
  287:     ?M(38658345:32/native),
  288:     case <<1:16/native>> of
  289: 	<<0,1>> -> native_big();
  290: 	<<1,0>> -> native_little()
  291:     end.
  292: 
  293: native_big() ->
  294:     <<37.33:64/native-float>> = <<37.33:64/big-float>>,
  295:     <<3974:16/native-integer>> = <<3974:16/big-integer>>,
  296:     <<$W/native-utf16>> = id(<<0,$W>>),
  297:     <<$W/native-utf32>> = id(<<0,0,0,$W>>),
  298:     {comment,"Big endian"}.
  299: 
  300: native_little() ->
  301:     <<37869.32343:64/native-float>> = <<37869.32343:64/little-float>>,
  302:     <<7974:16/native-integer>> = <<7974:16/little-integer>>,
  303:     <<$W/native-utf16>> = id(<<$W,0>>),
  304:     <<$W/native-utf32>> = id(<<$W,0,0,0>>),
  305:     {comment,"Little endian"}.
  306: 
  307: happi(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  308:     Bin = <<".123">>,
  309:     <<"123">> = lex_digits1(Bin, 1, []),
  310:     <<"123">> = lex_digits2(Bin, 1, []),
  311:     ok.
  312: 
  313: lex_digits1(<<$., Rest/binary>>,_Val,_Acc) ->
  314:     Rest;
  315: lex_digits1(<<N, Rest/binary>>,Val, Acc) when N >= $0 , N =< $9 ->
  316:     lex_digits1(Rest,Val*10+dec(N),Acc);
  317: lex_digits1(_Other,_Val,_Acc) ->
  318:     not_ok.
  319: 
  320: lex_digits2(<<N, Rest/binary>>,Val, Acc) when N >= $0 , N =< $9 ->
  321:     lex_digits2(Rest,Val*10+dec(N),Acc);
  322: lex_digits2(<<$., Rest/binary>>,_Val,_Acc) ->
  323:     Rest;
  324: lex_digits2(_Other,_Val,_Acc) ->
  325:     not_ok.
  326: 
  327: dec(A) ->
  328:     A-$0.  
  329: 
  330: size_var(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  331:     {<<45>>,<<>>} = split(<<1:16,45>>),
  332:     {<<45>>,<<46,47>>} = split(<<1:16,45,46,47>>),
  333:     {<<45,46>>,<<47>>} = split(<<2:16,45,46,47>>),
  334: 
  335:     {<<45,46,47>>,<<48>>} = split_2(<<16:8,3:16,45,46,47,48>>),
  336:     
  337:     {<<45,46>>,<<47>>} = split(2, <<2:16,45,46,47>>),
  338:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch split(42, <<2:16,45,46,47>>)),
  339: 
  340:     <<"cdef">> = skip(<<2:8,"abcdef">>),
  341:     
  342:     ok.
  343: 
  344: split(<<N:16,B:N/binary,T/binary>>) ->
  345:     {B,T}.
  346: 
  347: split(N, <<N:16,B:N/binary,T/binary>>) ->
  348:     {B,T}.
  349: 
  350: split_2(<<N0:8,N:N0,B:N/binary,T/binary>>) ->
  351:     {B,T}.
  352: 
  353: skip(<<N:8,_:N/binary,T/binary>>) -> T.
  354: 
  355: wiger(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  356:     ok1 = wcheck(<<3>>),
  357:     ok2 = wcheck(<<1,2,3>>),
  358:     ok3 = wcheck(<<4>>),
  359:     {error,<<1,2,3,4>>} = wcheck(<<1,2,3,4>>),
  360:     {error,<<>>} = wcheck(<<>>),
  361:     ok.
  362: 
  363: wcheck(<<A>>) when A==3->
  364:     ok1;
  365: wcheck(<<_,_:2/binary>>) ->
  366:     ok2;
  367: wcheck(<<_>>) ->
  368:     ok3;
  369: wcheck(Other) ->
  370:     {error,Other}.
  371: 
  372: %% Test that having the match context in x(0) works.
  373: 
  374: x0_context(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  375:     x0_0([], <<3.0:64/float,42:16,123456:32>>).
  376: 
  377: x0_0(_, Bin) ->
  378:     <<3.0:64/float,42:16,_/binary>> = Bin,
  379:     x0_1([], Bin, 64, 16, 2).
  380: 
  381: x0_1(_, Bin, FloatSz, IntSz, BinSz) ->
  382:     <<_:FloatSz/float,42:IntSz,B:BinSz/binary,C:1/binary,D/binary>> = Bin,
  383:     id({B,C,D}),
  384:     <<_:FloatSz/float,42:IntSz,B:BinSz/binary,_/binary>> = Bin,
  385:     x0_2([], Bin).
  386: 
  387: x0_2(_, Bin) ->
  388:     <<_:64,0:7,42:9,_/binary>> = Bin,
  389:     x0_3([], Bin).
  390: 
  391: x0_3(_, Bin) ->
  392:     case Bin of
  393:         <<_:72,7:8,_/binary>> ->
  394:             ct:fail(bs_matched_1);
  395:         <<_:64,0:16,_/binary>> ->
  396:             ct:fail(bs_matched_2);
  397:         <<_:64,42:16,123456:32,_/binary>> ->
  398:             ok
  399:     end.
  400: 
  401: 
  402: huge_float_field(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  403:     Sz = 1 bsl 27,
  404:     Bin = <<0:Sz>>,
  405: 
  406:     nomatch = overflow_huge_float_skip_32(Bin),
  407:     nomatch = overflow_huge_float_32(Bin),
  408: 
  409:     ok = overflow_huge_float(Bin, lists:seq(25, 32)++lists:seq(50, 64)),
  410:     ok = overflow_huge_float_unit128(Bin, lists:seq(25, 32)++lists:seq(50, 64)),
  411:     ok.
  412: 
  413: overflow_huge_float_skip_32(<<_:4294967296/float,0,_/binary>>) -> 1; % 1 bsl 32
  414: overflow_huge_float_skip_32(<<_:33554432/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>>) -> 2; % 1 bsl 25
  415: overflow_huge_float_skip_32(<<_:67108864/float-unit:64,0,_/binary>>) -> 3; % 1 bsl 26
  416: overflow_huge_float_skip_32(<<_:134217728/float-unit:32,0,_/binary>>) -> 4; % 1 bsl 27
  417: overflow_huge_float_skip_32(<<_:268435456/float-unit:16,0,_/binary>>) -> 5; % 1 bsl 28
  418: overflow_huge_float_skip_32(<<_:536870912/float-unit:8,0,_/binary>>) -> 6; % 1 bsl 29
  419: overflow_huge_float_skip_32(<<_:1073741824/float-unit:8,0,_/binary>>) -> 7; % 1 bsl 30
  420: overflow_huge_float_skip_32(<<_:2147483648/float-unit:8,0,_/binary>>) -> 8; % 1 bsl 31
  421: overflow_huge_float_skip_32(_) -> nomatch.
  422: 
  423: overflow_huge_float_32(<<F:4294967296/float,_/binary>>) -> {1,F}; % 1 bsl 32
  424: overflow_huge_float_32(<<F:33554432/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>>) -> {2,F}; % 1 bsl 25
  425: overflow_huge_float_32(<<F:67108864/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>>) -> {3,F}; % 1 bsl 26
  426: overflow_huge_float_32(<<F:134217728/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>>) -> {4,F}; % 1 bsl 27
  427: overflow_huge_float_32(<<F:268435456/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>>) -> {5,F}; % 1 bsl 28
  428: overflow_huge_float_32(<<F:536870912/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>>) -> {6,F}; % 1 bsl 29
  429: overflow_huge_float_32(<<F:1073741824/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>>) -> {7,F}; % 1 bsl 30
  430: overflow_huge_float_32(<<F:2147483648/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>>) -> {8,F}; % 1 bsl 31
  431: overflow_huge_float_32(_) -> nomatch.
  432: 
  433: 
  434: overflow_huge_float(Bin, [Sz0|Sizes]) ->
  435:     Sz = id(1 bsl Sz0),
  436:     case Bin of
  437: 	<<_:Sz/float-unit:8,0,_/binary>> ->
  438: 	    {error,Sz};
  439: 	_ ->
  440: 	    case Bin of
  441: 		<<Var:Sz/float-unit:8,0,_/binary>> ->
  442: 		    {error,Sz,Var};
  443: 		_ ->
  444: 		    overflow_huge_float(Bin, Sizes)
  445: 	    end
  446:     end;
  447: overflow_huge_float(_, []) -> ok.
  448: 
  449: overflow_huge_float_unit128(Bin, [Sz0|Sizes]) ->
  450:     Sz = id(1 bsl Sz0),
  451:     case Bin of
  452:         <<_:Sz/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>> ->
  453:             {error,Sz};
  454:         _ ->
  455:             case Bin of
  456:                 <<Var:Sz/float-unit:128,0,_/binary>> ->
  457:                     {error,Sz,Var};
  458:                 _ ->
  459:                     overflow_huge_float_unit128(Bin, Sizes)
  460:             end
  461:     end;
  462: overflow_huge_float_unit128(_, []) -> ok.
  463: 
  464: 
  465: %%
  466: %% Test that a writable binary can be safely matched.
  467: %%
  468: 
  469: writable_binary_matched(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  470:     WritableBin = create_writeable_binary(),
  471:     writable_binary_matched(WritableBin, WritableBin, 500).
  472: 
  473: writable_binary_matched(<<0>>, _, N) ->
  474:     if N =:= 0 -> ok;
  475:        true ->
  476:            put(grow_heap, [N|get(grow_heap)]),
  477:            WritableBin = create_writeable_binary(),
  478:            writable_binary_matched(WritableBin, WritableBin, N-1)
  479:     end;
  480: writable_binary_matched(<<B:8,T/binary>>, WritableBin0, N) ->
  481:     WritableBin = writable_binary(WritableBin0, B),
  482:     writable_binary_matched(T, WritableBin, N).
  483: 
  484: writable_binary(WritableBin0, B) when is_binary(WritableBin0) ->
  485:     %% Heavy append to force the binary to move.
  486:     WritableBin = <<WritableBin0/binary,0:(size(WritableBin0))/unit:8,B>>,
  487:     id(<<(id(0)):128/unit:8>>),
  488:     WritableBin.
  489: 
  490: create_writeable_binary() ->
  491:   <<(id(<<>>))/binary,1,2,3,4,5,6,0>>.
  492: 
  493: otp_7198(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  494:     %% When a match context was reused, and grown at the same time to
  495:     %% increase the number of saved positions, the thing word was not updated
  496:     %% to account for the new size. Therefore, if there was a garbage collection,
  497:     %% the new slots would be included in the garbage collection.
  498:     [do_otp_7198(FillerSize) || FillerSize <- lists:seq(0, 256)],
  499:     ok.
  500: 
  501: do_otp_7198(FillerSize) ->
  502:     Filler = erlang:make_tuple(FillerSize, 42),
  503:     {Pid,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> do_otp_7198_test(Filler) end),
  504:     receive
  505: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,Pid,normal} ->
  506: 	    ok;
  507: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,Pid,Reason} ->
  508: 	    ct:fail("unexpected: ~p", [Reason])
  509:     end.
  510:     
  511: do_otp_7198_test(_) ->
  512:     [{'KEYWORD',114},
  513:      {'KEYWORD',101},
  514:      {'KEYWORD',103},
  515:      {'KEYWORD',105},
  516:      {'KEYWORD',111},
  517:      {'FIELD',110},
  518:      {'KEYWORD',119},
  519:      {'KEYWORD',104},
  520:      {'KEYWORD',97},
  521:      {'KEYWORD',116},
  522:      {'KEYWORD',101},
  523:      {'KEYWORD',118},
  524:      {'KEYWORD',101},
  525:      {'KEYWORD',114},
  526:      '$thats_all_folks$'] = otp_7198_scan(<<"region:whatever">>, []).
  527: 
  528:     
  529: otp_7198_scan(<<>>, TokAcc) ->
  530:         lists:reverse(['$thats_all_folks$' | TokAcc]);
  531: 
  532: otp_7198_scan(<<D, Z, Rest/binary>>, TokAcc) when
  533:                         (D =:= $D orelse D =:= $d) and
  534:                         ((Z =:= $\s) or (Z =:= $() or (Z =:= $))) ->
  535:     otp_7198_scan(<<Z, Rest/binary>>, ['AND' | TokAcc]);
  536: 
  537: otp_7198_scan(<<D>>, TokAcc) when
  538:                         (D =:= $D) or (D =:= $d) ->
  539:     otp_7198_scan(<<>>, ['AND' | TokAcc]);
  540: 
  541: otp_7198_scan(<<N, Z, Rest/binary>>, TokAcc) when
  542:                         (N =:= $N orelse N =:= $n) and
  543:                         ((Z =:= $\s) or (Z =:= $() or (Z =:= $))) ->
  544:     otp_7198_scan(<<Z, Rest/binary>>, ['NOT' | TokAcc]);
  545: 
  546: otp_7198_scan(<<C, Rest/binary>>, TokAcc) when
  547:                                 (C >= $A) and (C =< $Z);
  548:                                 (C >= $a) and (C =< $z);
  549:                                 (C >= $0) and (C =< $9) ->
  550:     case Rest of
  551:         <<$:, R/binary>> ->
  552:             otp_7198_scan(R, [{'FIELD', C} | TokAcc]);
  553:         _ ->
  554:             otp_7198_scan(Rest, [{'KEYWORD', C} | TokAcc])
  555:     end.
  556: 
  557: unordered_bindings(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  558:     {<<1,2,3,4>>,<<42,42>>,<<3,3,3>>} =
  559: 	unordered_bindings(4, 2, 3, <<1,2,3,4, 42,42, 3,3,3, 3>>),
  560:     ok.
  561: 
  562: unordered_bindings(CompressedLength, HashSize, PadLength, T) ->
  563:     <<Content:CompressedLength/binary,Mac:HashSize/binary,
  564:      Padding:PadLength/binary,PadLength>> = T,
  565:     {Content,Mac,Padding}.
  566: 
  567: %% ERL-901: A load-time optimization assumed that match contexts had no further
  568: %% uses when a bs_get_binary2 overwrote the match context's register, and
  569: %% figured it would be safe to reuse the match context's memory for the
  570: %% resulting binary.
  571: %%
  572: %% This is no longer safe as of OTP 22, as a match context may be reused after
  573: %% being passed to another function.
  574: unsafe_get_binary_reuse(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  575:     <<_First, Rest/binary>> = <<"hello">>,
  576:     ubgr_1(Rest),
  577:     <<Second,_/bits>> = Rest,
  578:     $e = Second,
  579:     ok.
  580: 
  581: ubgr_1(<<_CP/utf8, Rest/binary>>) -> id(Rest);
  582: ubgr_1(_) -> false.
  583: 
  584: -define(FP16(EncodedInt, Float),
  585:         (fun(NlInt, NlFloat) ->
  586:                   <<F1:16/float>> = <<NlInt:16>>,
  587:                   fcmp(F1, NlFloat),
  588:                   <<F2:16/float>> = <<(NlInt+16#8000):16>>,
  589:                   fcmp(F2, NlFloat),
  590:                   <<F3:16/float-little>> = <<NlInt:16/little>>,
  591:                   fcmp(F3, NlFloat),
  592:                   <<F4:16/float-little>> = <<(NlInt+16#8000):16/little>>,
  593:                   fcmp(F4, NlFloat),
  594:                   <<F5:16/float-native>> = <<NlInt:16/native>>,
  595:                   fcmp(F5, NlFloat),
  596:                   <<F6:16/float-native>> = <<(NlInt+16#8000):16/native>>,
  597:                   fcmp(F6, NlFloat)
  598:          end)(nonliteral(EncodedInt), nonliteral(Float)),
  599:         (fun() ->
  600:                   <<F1:16/float>> = <<EncodedInt:16>>,
  601:                   fcmp(F1, Float),
  602:                   <<F2:16/float>> = <<(EncodedInt+16#8000):16>>,
  603:                   fcmp(F2, Float),
  604:                   <<F3:16/float-little>> = <<EncodedInt:16/little>>,
  605:                   fcmp(F3, Float),
  606:                   <<F4:16/float-little>> = <<(EncodedInt+16#8000):16/little>>,
  607:                   fcmp(F4, Float),
  608:                   <<F3:16/float-native>> = <<EncodedInt:16/native>>,
  609:                   fcmp(F3, Float),
  610:                   <<F4:16/float-native>> = <<(EncodedInt+16#8000):16/native>>,
  611:                   fcmp(F4, Float)
  612:          end)()).
  613: 
  614: nonliteral(X) -> X.
  615: 
  616: fp16(_Config) ->
  617:     %% smallest positive subnormal number
  618:     ?FP16(16#0001, 0.000000059604645),
  619:     %% largest positive subnormal number
  620:     ?FP16(16#03ff, 0.000060975552),
  621:     %% smallest positive normal number
  622:     ?FP16(16#0400, 0.00006103515625),
  623:     %% largest normal number
  624:     ?FP16(16#7bff, 65504),
  625:     ?FP16(16#7bff, 65504.0),
  626:     %% largest number less than one
  627:     ?FP16(16#3bff, 0.99951172),
  628:     %% zero
  629:     ?FP16(16#0000, 0.0),
  630:     %% one
  631:     ?FP16(16#3c00, 1),
  632:     ?FP16(16#3c00, 1.0),
  633:     %% smallest number larger than one
  634:     ?FP16(16#3c01, 1.00097656),
  635:     %% rounding of 1/3 to nearest
  636:     ?FP16(16#3555, 0.33325195),
  637:     %% others
  638:     ?FP16(16#4000, 2),
  639:     ?FP16(16#4000, 2.0),
  640:     ok.
  641: 
  642: bad_bs_match(_Config) ->
  643:     Lines = ["-module(bad_bs_match).",
  644:              "-export([f/1]).",
  645:              "f(<<X:16,_/binary>>) -> X."],
  646:     {Forms,_} =
  647:         lists:mapfoldl(fun(Line, L0) ->
  648:                                {ok,Tokens,L} = erl_scan:string(Line ++ "\n", L0),
  649:                                {ok,Form} = erl_parse:parse_form(Tokens),
  650:                                {Form,L}
  651:                        end, 1, Lines),
  652:     {ok,Mod,Beam0} = compile:forms(Forms, [binary]),
  653: 
  654:     %% Introduce a non-existing sub command of the bs_match instruction.
  655:     Beam = binary:replace(Beam0, <<"ensure_at_least">>, <<"future_cool_cmd">>),
  656:     true = Beam0 =/= Beam,
  657: 
  658:     %% There should be an error when attempting to load this BEAM
  659:     %% file, not a runtime crash.
  660:     {error,badfile} = code:load_binary(Mod, "", Beam),
  661: 
  662:     ok.
  663: 
  664: 
  665: %%% Common utilities.
  666: id(I) -> I.
  667:
